name: 23 - T02 - Chaotic Images
author: Njc5YzFjZDI5NjZl
command:
// This is an extreme example...
let params =
[{
    filterType: "images",
    filterId: "myChaoticImages",
    time: 0,
    nbImage: 4,
    alphaImg: 1.0,
    alphaChr: 0.0,
    blend: 4,
    ampX: 0.10,
    ampY: 0.10,
    padding: 80,
    zOrder: 20,
    animated :
    {
      time: 
      { 
        active: true, 
        speed: 0.0010, 
        animType: "move" 
      },
      ampX:
      {
        active: true,
        val1: 0.00,
        val2: 0.30,
        chaosFactor: 0.03,
        animType: "syncChaoticOscillation",
        loopDuration: 2000
      },
      ampY:
      {
        active: true,
        val1: 0.00,
        val2: 0.30,
        chaosFactor: 0.04,
        animType: "syncChaoticOscillation",
        loopDuration: 1650
      },
      alphaChr:        
      { 
        active: true, 
        animType: "randomNumberPerLoop", 
        val1: 0.0, 
        val2: 1,
        loopDuration: 250
      },
      alphaImg:        
      { 
        active: true, 
        animType: "randomNumberPerLoop", 
        val1: 0.8, 
        val2: 1,
        loopDuration: 250
      },
      nbImage:
      {
        active: true,
        val1: 1,
        val2: 9,
        animType: "syncSinOscillation",
        loopDuration: 1400
      }
    }
}];

await TokenMagic.addUpdateFiltersOnSelected(params);
